MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G81 postcode area of Clydebank, affecting properties in Craigbanzo Street and surrounding streets. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.00AM due to repairs required to electrical equipment on Craigbanzo Street. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 1.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 10.48AM on 30 January 2021.
